title: What happened to Jax?
body:
Did the meta shift or something? Why is he not that strong anymore?

{{champion:24}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:24}}

replies.body: He's still got the same strength and weaknesses. But the meta has shifted to a point where other top lanners either counter him or at least can do well against him. His early game is weaker now as well which makes all the ranged bullies or high sustain champs do really well against him. So he's still just as good as always, just his lane opponents are harder to match up to.
Holy fuck I haven't seen Jax played in about 5 months, lol.
Because Irelia is the new Jax.
Jax gets ruined by kiting + CC + burst and that's pretty much all this meta is atm.
meta changed. ranged tops fuck him up. that's where irelia is stronger. so you pick her instead.
His early game got nerfed so you have to be a good Jax instead of a mindless one for him to survive it early. Still a late game beast. He even got some scaling buffs, so his late game is better
He's as strong as he always has been, it's just that the meta has shifted away from him and those he is a great match up for aren't played as much.
I feel sorry for Jax, so when I'm matched up with him I'm sure to give him pleanty of kills to make up for the lack of him being played. Much charitable. Such Jesus, much christian
